titles.title: NBACC Authorization Act of 2023
National Biodefense Analysis and Countermeasures Center Authorization Act of 2023
NBACC Authorization Act of 2023
A bill to designate a laboratory as the National Biodefense Analysis and Countermeasures Center, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary:
National Biodefense Analysis and Countermeasures Center Authorization Act of 2023 or the NBACC Authorization Act of 2023
This bill provides statutory authority for the National Biodefense Analysis and Countermeasures Center (NBACC) in the Department of Homeland Security's Science and Technology Directorate.
The directorate must conduct a mission needs assessment of the NBACC.
